Purpose: To generate consistent, accurate, and reliable analytical results for Wheat IgG4 testing.
Container: Serum collection tube without anticoagulant (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: ELISA reader, microplate washer, centrifuge, adjustable and fixed-volume pipettes, calibrated timers, refrigerator (2–8 °C), freezer (−20 °C or colder)
